name: TD Basic
description:
NOTE: This is not being maintained, to be honest I forgot it existed.

My attempt to make a more basic TorrentDay layout.
additional_info:
First release:
The banner is reduced in height, and fancy banner graphics removed.
Torrent search 2.1 has coloured text descriptors for categories instead of the icons. HD movies & tv should be brighter than SD, but the categories aren't exactly along those line and not all torrents seem to be in the correct categories.

NOTE: Your torrentday settings must have "Torrent Title Font-Weight" set to "Bold When New", otherwise the styled "New!" tags won't show - and neither will the default ones! This style removes the bold formatting again, to instead keep it is a simple edit of the code with instructions provided on the first line.

Second release:
Fixed PM pop up message. Rearranged the order of torrent size, torrent file link, etc - at set fixed widths.

Third release:
Moved new tag to left of title, moved freeleech tag to right of torrent time and coloured torrent time red when freeleech. Also highlighted the links to the search page in the header.
